entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 4:38 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: N 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
